metadata.title: CVE-2019-9811 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: As part of a winning Pwn2Own entry, a researcher demonstrated a sandboxescape by installing a malicious language pack and then opening a browserfeature that used the compromised translation. This vulnerability affectsFirefox ESR < 60.8, Firefox < 68, and Thunderbird < 60.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
